name: rpdaley-com-v2
description: Rewrite of rpdaley.com using React, Next.js,

scripts.dev: export NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && NODE_ENV=development next
scripts.build: export NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && NODE_ENV=production next build
scripts.stage: export NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && NODE_ENV=staging next build
scripts.start: export NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && next start
scripts.static: export NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && next build && next export
scripts.analyze: export NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && ANALYZE=true next build

author: RP Daley <rpdaley@gmail.com>
